column4: Anyone know how to get the guestaddons iso on my desktop in Ubuntu?
the addons for virtual box are run in the guest, which version are yoiu running.
in the top panel is the guest additions just clck to mount then run the linux set.
here is a link that can help you find them if needed. http://www.dedoimedo.com/computers/virtualbox-guest-addons.html  a little older but the basic info is there.
